After seeing this movie, one thought goes through my mind: USA and France are very different :D
While one seems to like the ultimate in violence and blood but little in nudity at all, the other is completely opposite.
Also this movie has without a doubt the worst two death scenes i have EVER seen. Maybe it was meant ironic? could be ....
